meanings.definition: Covered in or characterized by snow.
meanings.sent1: The mountain was snowier than the valley.
meanings.sent2: The snowier landscape made everything look magical.
meanings.sent3: The snowier the day, the happier the kids!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a snowier day.
meanings.sent5: The snowier scene outside was like a winter wonderland.

meanings.definition: Having more snow than something else.
meanings.sent1: The snowier hill was perfect for sledding.
meanings.sent2: The snowier side of the street was untouched by footprints.
meanings.sent3: The snowier the better when it comes to building snowmen!
meanings.sent4: His excitement was as deep as the snowier driveway.
meanings.sent5: The snowier path led to a hidden winter paradise.
